page.title: 01COWPLAIN AND HORNDEAN
page.content: {Cowplain}is part of the Borough of Havant & Waterloo & is an extensive modern residential area focusing on the A3.Recent housing neighbourhoods have grown up catering for a wide range of income groups.Among these are the{Berg, Hazelton & Wecock}Estates & some slightly earlier centres like {Lovedean & Padnell. Horndean}is part of the East Hants Rural Dist. & is a village on the A3 of some antiquity. Both areas have low order shopping centres & tend to act as dormitory areas for workers commuting to Portsmouth,Havant & Waterlooville. The small village of{Blendworth}is also included.Some 20 000 people live within the block & attractive farmland with some woodland skirt the edges of the block on all sides except the south where similar urban development extends to Waterlooville.
